local_intent: Open the dishwasher door and verify it is open.
assumptions: Handle is already grasped and grasp is stable from upstream steps.
End-effector is yaw-aligned to the handle and positioned to pull.
Workspace in front of the dishwasher is clear for door motion.
coherence_with_global: Implements the OpenContainer action (hinged_door, 1500 ms) followed by ContainerOpen check, matching the corresponding segment in GLOBAL_BT after grasping the handle.
